name: Backline Raider
description: Your Attack and Spell Casting Speed is increased.

name: Pinch Runner
description: Gain additional Stamina Points while at low Health. This Effect has a Cooldown.

name: Covert Operative
description: Increases your Passive Dodge Chance Score

name: The Wild Card
description: Attacks and Spells are more likely to be Critical Hits.

name: The Heat of Battle
description: Taking Damage gives you more Rage.

name: Second Wind
description: When below a certain threshold of Health your Health Regeneration is triggered. This Effect has a Cooldown.

name: Attrition Strategist
description: Increases your Ailment Chance Score with all Ailments

name: Thirst for Knowledge
description: Health Globes now restore your Force Shield as well as your Health.

name: Purifier's Will
description: When your Force Shield is full, you receive decreased Damage.

name: Blessing of the Jade Legion
description: A percentage of Physical Damage is converted into Toxic Damage.

name: Slipping Shadow
description: Active Dodges can go through Enemies.

name: Clandestine Execution
description: Deal increased Damage when only one Enemy is Nearby.

name: Phantom Strike
description: Dash Attacks have an increased Chance to be Critical Hits.

name: Merciless Lethality
description: Your Critical Damage is increased, but your Damage is decreased.

name: Come What May
description: Projectiles that Hit an Enemy at close range Pierce them, meaning that the Projectile can Hit other Enemies behind them.

name: Persistence Hunting
description: Enemies that have Impaired Movement (Slowed, in Stasis, Stunned or Frozen) take increased Damage.

name: Archion's Teachings
description: Attacks and Spells that launch Projectiles now launch an additional Projectile. The Damage of each Projectile is decreased.

name: Meditative Focus
description: Deal increased Damage when Far-Away from Enemies.

name: Safe From Afar
description: Enemies take increased Damage from your Projectiles, the Damage scaling (up to a limit) with their distance away from where you launched the Projectile.

name: Gods amongst Men
description: Physical, Toxic and Rend damage is increased. You cannot inflict other Damage Types.

name: Bestial Frenzy
description: Increased Damage for each Enemy within Melee Range.

name: Feast for the Crows
description: Give all forms of damage Life Leech. Life Leech heals you on the next tick of Health Regeneration.

name: Manic Slaughter
description: The more Rage you have, the more Damage you deal. This applies to all Damage Types.

name: Blood Reaper
description: A percentage of Physical Damage becomes Rend Damage.

name: Selfless Courage
description: Blocking a Hit provides you and your Allies with an increased All Resistances Score Buff.

name: Retaliator
description: Each point of Physical Resistance increases the Damage you deal with all Damage Types, but decreases your Critical Chance Score.

name: Kingless Aegis
description: Benefit from Block Chance with any Weapon equipped

name: Sacred Oath
description: Blocking an Enemy's attack inflicts them with Weakness.

name: Blessed Manna
description: Health Globes will now provide a temporary Buff to your Resistances as well as Healing you.

name: Insidious Decay
description: When inflicting Ailments, the number of Stacks inflicted on an Enemy is increased. The Damage you deal from sources other than those that deal damage-over-time is decreased.

name: Primordial Insights
description: Ailment Stacks inflicted with Critical Hits can deal Critical Damage.

name: Grievous Afflictions
description: Hits can usually only apply one ailment type. Now 2 different ailments can be applied with the same hit.

name: Power of the First Men
description: When inflicting an Ailment, there is a Chance to double the number of Ailment Stacks inflicted.

name: Immortal Offering
description: Killing an enemy that is afflicted with Ailments gives you a temporary Damage increase Buff.

name: Residual Energy
description: Casting a Spell increases the Damage of your Attacks for a short period of time. The Damage Type of those Attacks is the same as the last Spell Cast.

name: Duty to Exterminate
description: Increases Maximum Rage and Willpower.

name: Reining In the Darkness
description: Your Spell Critical Chance Score is increased when your Willpower is above a certain threshold.

name: Resilience to Corruption
description: When you are afflicted with damage over time, ailment damage affects your Force Shield before your Health.

name: Faith Leech
description: Dealing Damage will now allow you to recharge Force Shield instead of restoring Health with Life Leech.

name: Branded Burst
description: After a few seconds of not being Hit, you gain a "Tenet" point. When you are Hit you ignore a percentage of the Damage and lose a "Tenet" point. The amount of Damage not dealt is increased with each point you have.

name: Blessed Silver
description:
You have 5 "Annointed Ammunition" points that replenish every few seconds. "Annointed Ammunition" also replenishes  when you complete an Active Dodge.

For every "Annointed Ammunition" point you have, your Projectile Damage is increased.

For every "Annointed Ammunition" point you have missing, your Melee Damage is increased.

name: Academic Fieldwork
description: Every time you kill a Champion enemy, you gain 1 "Headhunter" point up to a Maximum. Each "Headhunter" point increases your Material Damage for a few seconds. Your "Headhunter" points will be reset if you do not aquire a new point within a given timeframe.

name: Hungry Stalactite
description: Damage is increased based on how much Pierce is remaining on a Projectile after it has Hit an Enemy.

name: Wintry Hail
description: When a Projectile Hits an Enemy, it will bounce off them and hit another enemy, dealing increased Frost Damage. Projectiles will not bounce if they have Pierce remaining.

name: Acute Tracking
description: Every second that you are in combat you receive "Cold Blooded" points that increase your Damage. If you are Hit the "Cold Blooded" points are removed.

name: Static Transferral
description: Each time you use a Basic Attack, you receive an "Overload" point that increases your Damage. When you use a Skill, every "Overload" point is removed and the total Damage Buff provided by your "Overload" points is doubled.

name: Intravenous Neural Cord
description: Whenever you inflict a Critical Hit on an Enemy, your Attack Speed Score is increased for a short duration.

name: Sparking Dart
description:
You have "Power Charge" points. This resource is now used to activate any Device Skills or Skills that deal the Lightning Damage Type. The resource can have any value between -100 and 100. When Power Charge is a positive number, your Damage will be increased, and when it is a negative number, your Damage will be decreased.

Power Charge is regenerated over time, and by using your Basic Attacks.

These Skills still consume their dedicated Resource in addition to "Power Charge".

name: Tethered Shade
description: Whenever you Active Dodge, enemies in your path receive Damage and a Decoy is left at the starting position of the Active Dodge.

name: Life's First Movement
description:
You have 5 "Lure of Darkness" points and 5 "Lure of Light" points. When using a Spell you gain 1 "Lure of Darkness" point and lose 1 "Lure of Light" point. When using an Attack you gain 1 "Lure of Light" point and lose 1 "Lure of Darkness" point. When both points are weighted 6/4, they are considered to be in Equilibrium. While in this state, you will receive the following Buffs:

A percentage of your Attack Damage is added to your Spell Damage.

A percentage of your Spell Damage is added to your Attack Damage.

name: Waltzing Smoke
description: Whenever you complete an Active Dodge, you become Invisible and your next Attack deals increased Shadow damage.

name: Furious Appetite
description:
Your Willpower generated is transferred into Rage.

Your Willpower Regeneration is also applied to Rage instead.

name: Blistering Embrace
description: When you Hit an Enemy that has a certain number of Burn Stacks, your Hits have a Chance to consume the Burn Stacks that you inflicted and deal increased Damage per the number of Stacks consumed.

name: Flurrying Flames
description: Each time you Hit an Enemy, you receive an "Unleashed Fury" point. Each "Unleashed Fury" point increases your Attack Speed Score, your Life Leech, and decreases your All Resistances Score.

name: Virtuose Stance
description:
You unlock the "Probing Weakness" and "Stalwart Resolve" Stances, each one giving you different Buffs. Using an Active Dodge changes your Stance.

While in the "Probing Weakness" Stance, your All Resistances Score is decreased, but your Basic Attacks have a chance to deal double Damage, including on Critical Hits.

While in the "Stalwart Resolve" Stance, your Attack and Spell Casting Speed Score is decreased, but your Block Chance is increased.

name: Proud Reprisal
description: If you Block an Enemy’s attack, you instantly deal a percentage of your Weapon Damage in a counter-attack.

name: Pugilist's Momentum
description:
Completing Basic Attacks with the same Weapon 4 times within a short period grants you different Buffs depending on the Weapon.

One-handed and dual-wielded Weapons always inflict Critical Hits on the 4th Basic Attack.

Two-handed axes, hammers, and swords always inflict Stun in an area of effect on the 4th Basic Attack.

Bows always launch Projectiles in 360 degrees around you on the 4th Basic Attack.

Staffs always launch multiple Projectiles on the 4th Basic Attack.

name: Salvatory Anchor
description:
You will receive a Buff depending on which archetype your equipped Chest-piece belongs to.

If you have a Bruiser Chest-piece, you receive Health Regeneration for each Health point on the Armor.

If you have a Heavy Chest-piece, its All Resistances Score is doubled.

If you have a Rogue Chest-piece, you regenerate Health and Force Shield each time you complete a Passive Dodge. The amount that you regenerate is determined by the Health points given by the Armor.

If you have a Sorcerer Chest-piece you regenerate Force Shield based on the amount of Force Shield on the Armor.

name: Belligerent Banner
description: Every few seconds you gain a "Fortress" point up to a Maximum. Each "Fortress" point increases your Block Chance. "Fortress" points are removed when a Block is completed.

name: Disallowing Vessel
description: While stationary you gain an "Inexorable" point every few seconds. Each point of "Inexorable" decreases your Movement Speed and increases your Damage. Moving will cause an "Inexorable" point to be removed after a few seconds.

name: Dawn's Pious Striker
description: Enemies are killed instantly if Hit while their Health is below a certain threshold. This only works on Underling and Specialist enemies.

name: Unflagging Prayer
description: When your Health is below a certain threshold, you make a "Prayer", giving a Buff to the All Resistances Score of your Allies for a few seconds and reviving Downed Allies. This Effect has a large cooldown.

name: Beacon For the Lost
description:
When your Force Shield is above a certain percentage, your Spells that deal Sacred Damage deal increased Damage.

When your Force Shield is below a certain threshold, your Attacks that deal Sacred Damage deal increased Damage.

This ability only works if your Force Shield is above 0.

name: Ancient Fervour
description:
Using Skills that deal Elemental Damage you their corresponding "Accord". Each Accord has different Effects depending on its Elemental Damage Type.

"Beelmalik's Accord" increases your Critical Chance Score for a few seconds.

"Abanazaar's Accord" increases your Damage for a few seconds.

"Etheliel's Accord" increases your Ailment Chance Score for a few seconds.

name: Elementary Destabilization
description:
Whenever your Willpower is below a certain percentage, each time you use a Skill there is a Chance that you will cause an explosion. You and Enemies take a percentage of your maximum Health OR Force Shield (whichever is highest) as Damage, and a percentage of your Willpower is regenerated.

The Damage type of the Damage dealt is selected randomly between Lightning, Fire, and Frost.

name: Omnitempest
description:
Certain Skills that deal Elemental Damage Types have a chance to launch other Spells when Cast.

Lightning Skills can launch a Chain Lightning Spell.

Fire skills can launch a Meteor Spell.

Frost skills can launch a Frost Lance Spell.

name: Which Time Cannot Heal
description: When you Damage an Enemy that is afflicted with Stasis, they will take the Damage again after a few seconds.

name: Captured Velocity
description:
If you inflict Stasis on an enemy with an Attack, you gain a "Supernatural Paradox" point. Each point of "Supernatural Paradox" increases your Spell Casting Speed Score.

If you inflict Stasis on an enemy with a Spell, you gain an "Earthly Paradox" point. Each point of "Earthly Paradox" increases your Attack Speed Score.

name: Dire Juncture
description:
A portion of the Damage you receive is delayed, and this delayed Damage does not interrupt Force Shield Regeneration.

Your Maximum Health and Force Shield is decreased.

name: Undertaker
description: Enemies that die near you have a chance to drop a Green Globe. If picked up, the Globe will increase your Toxic damage for a short duration. This Buff Stacks with each Globe picked up.

name: Toxic Emanations
description: Enemies receive a Stack of Poison every few seconds when they are close to you.

name: Sacrifice of Flesh
description: Your Maximum Health and Force Shield is decreased, but your Summons receive decreased Damage.

name: Occult Affliction
description: The Occult damage that an Enemy receives from your Attacks is increased with each Curse stack they are afflicted with.

name: Fatal Pact
description:
Every Ailment that Stacks which you inflict is also inflicted on you. Each time you reach 10 Stacks of one Ailment Type, that Ailment Type is removed completely, giving you and your Allies a Buff for a short time depending on which Ailment type is removed.

If Stasis Stacks were removed, Movement Speed is increased.

If Curse Stacks were removed, All Resistances Score is increased.

If Weakness Stacks were removed, Damage is increased.

If any other stacks were removed, Health and Force Shield are regenerated.

name: Masochistic Effigy
description:
Maximum Force Shield is doubled.

Your Health cannot exceed 5% of your Maximum Force Shield.
